head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTMAN, JULES I.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTMAN, JULES I.

block.p: LICHTMAN-Jules I., 84. Of West Orange, NJ, and Palm Beach, FL. on August 1, 2000. Loving husband of Shirley (nee Kay). Devoted father of Dorothy, Kay, Jane and John and Barbara Lichtman. Dear brother of the late Cecil. Cherished grandfather of Jason, Maggie, Colby, John Daniel and Victor. Adored great grandfather of Julia. President of J. Lichtman and Sons and The Lichtman Foundation. Funeral service Thursday, August 3, 2000 at 12PM at Oheb Shalom Congregation in South Orange, NJ. Interment Oheb Shalom Cemetery, Hillside, NJ. Donations may be made to St. Barnabas Development Foundation, 94 Old Short Hills Road, Livingston, NJ, 07039.

Donations may be made to St. Barnabas Development Foundation, 94 Old Short Hills Road, Livingston, NJ, 07039.
